subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Syracuse wide receiver Taj Smith hauled in the pass from quarterback Andrew Robinson and raced 79 yards for a touchdown on the game’s first play, and the visiting Orange were on the way to a 38-35 victory over the No. 18 Louisville Cardinals yesterday.
snippet: Syracuse wide receiver Taj Smith hauled in the pass from quarterback Andrew Robinson and raced 79 yards for a touchdown on the game’s first play, and the visiting Orange were on the way to a 38-35 victory over the No. 18 Louisville Cardinals...
